jd:
From: Praveen Kumar, Largeton inc praveenk@largeton.us Reply to: praveenk@largeton.us Job Title: Business Analyst
Location: Lansing, MI( Relocation will work)
Duration: +6Months
Visa: USC/GC/EAD
Client: State of MI
Department- It’s for IT - Michigan
Required Skills & Experience:
Education: Bachelor’s Degree required.
Experience:
1-3 years of experience with Power BI (PBI), R, IBM SPSS, or Tableau.
3-5 years of experience with Microsoft Project and Excel.
3-5 years of experience with Remedy/Helix.
3-5 years of experience in a large enterprise and multiple network platforms.
5+ years of experience in customer interaction.
Preferred Experience:
2-3 years with DevOps.
3-5 years in a telecommunications environment.
3-5 years working with multiple network lines of service.
Key Responsibilities:
Data Handling and Analysis: Receiving and processing weekly datasets from the Helix service, and using appropriate algorithms to extrapolate and prepare this data for reporting.
Reporting: Providing detailed presentations, reports, and metrics based on the data, including workload and project analysis.
Meeting Facilitation: Leading meetings to discuss data analysis, focusing on workload and project results.
Collaboration: Working with multiple teams, including vendors and departments, to ensure alignment and successful data reporting.
Core Competencies:
CRISP-DM Process Knowledge: Familiarity with the data mining project steps, including business understanding, data preparation, modeling, evaluation, and deployment.
Communication Skills: Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to communicate effectively across different stakeholders.
Organization & Prioritization: Highly organized with the ability to prioritize tasks efficiently.
